page.title: 10DYFFRYN HOUSE
page.content: {Dyffryn House}is a superb venue for conferences, lectures and courses. During 1985 there have been the following leisure courses open to the public :- Welsh, Yoga, Public Speaking, Photography, Gardening, Cake Decoration, Guitar, Bridge, Tapestry & Weaving, Drama, Upholstery, Weather Forecasting and Flower Arranging. Weekend courses cost Â£36 for residents of Mid or South Glamorgan or Â£40 for residents of other authorities. It is an inclusive charge for board, accomodation and tuition from dinner Friday evening to lunch on Sunday. Day courses cost Â£9 irrespective of the county in which you reside and includes coffee, lunch, afternoon tea and tuition.
